name: wamu wamu 2 (itch)
description:
wamu wamu 2 is the sequel to wamu wamu

it is an experimental game that is about pieces of fruit that are infested by big worms
please clean the poor fruits :(

 

Arrow Keys to move
Z to jump
X to interact
C to switch tool

Current Sokpop Collection

and our previous game passenger seat, immediately!
